<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/45821</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>45821</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_1021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_1021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Determinantes: cálculo y propiedades.</string>
            <string language="en">Determinants: calculation and properties.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmende Faktoren: Berechnung und 
Eigenschaften.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Causes déterminantes : calcul et 
propriétés.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinantes: cálculo e propriedades.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fattori determinanti: calcolo e proprietà.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικοί παράγοντες: υπολογισμός και 
ιδιότητες.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de determinante. Se estudia su definición, propiedades y aplicaciones de los determinantes al cálculo del rango y de la inversa de una matriz.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which use simulations to explain the concept of determinant, its definition, properties and applications to the calculation of the rank and inverse of a matrix.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">determinante</string>
            <string language="en">determinant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">matriz</string>
            <string language="en">matrix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cálculo</string>
            <string language="en">calculus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rango</string>
            <string language="en">rank</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welche Gebrauchsimulationen, 
zum des Konzeptes des bestimmenden Faktors, seiner Definition, der 
Eigenschaften und der Anwendungen der Berechnung des Rank und des 
Gegenteils einer Matrix zu erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations d'utilisation 
pour expliquer le concept de la cause déterminante, de sa 
définition, des propriétés et des applications au calcul du grade 
et de l'inverse d'une matrice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações do uso para explicar o 
conceito da determinante, da sua definição, das propriedades e das 
aplicações ao cálculo do Rank e do inverse de uma matriz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di uso per spiegare 
il concetto del determinante, della relativa definizione, delle 
proprietà e delle applicazioni al calcolo del Rank e dell'inverso di 
una tabella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιούν τις προσομοιώσεις
για να εξηγήσουν την έννοια του καθοριστικού παράγοντα, του 
καθορισμού, των ιδιοτήτων και των αιτήσεών του στον υπολογισμό 
της τάξης και του αντιστρόφου μιας μήτρας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bestimmend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Matrix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déterminant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matrice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tabella</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθοριστικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
